public class VendingMachine extends Object

    • checkBuy

      public int checkBuy​(double payment, int slotNum)
      checks if the transaction is valid
      Parameters:
      payment - the payment
      slotNum - the slot number
      Returns:
      1 if the transaction was a success, 0 if the payment was not enough, -1 if the machine cant give change, and -2 if the item is unavailable/out of stock

    • buyItem

      public int buyItem​(double payment, int slotNum)
      buys an item
      Parameters:
      payment - the payment
      slotNum - the slot number
      Returns:
      1 if the transaction was a success, 0 if the payment was not enough, -1 if the machine cant give change, and -2 if the item is unavailable/out of stock
